scripts.deploy-stg: npm run prepare-stg && graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy carbon-opus-staging --node https://api.subgraph.somnia.network/deploy --ipfs https://api.subgraph.somnia.network/ipfs --deploy-key
scripts.deploy-prd: npm run prepare-prd && graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy carbon-opus-production --node https://api.subgraph.somnia.network/deploy --ipfs https://api.subgraph.somnia.network/ipfs --deploy-key
